articles.title: France Confirms First Case Of British Virus Variant In London Returnee - NDTV
articles.description: The first case of a particularly infectious coronavirus variant that recently emerged in Britain has been confirmed in France, the health ministry said on Friday.
articles.content:
The person arrived from London on December 19 and was tested in hospital on December 21.
Paris, France: France has confirmed the first case of a new coronavirus variant that recently emerged in Brit… [+2413 chars]

articles.title: Turkey To Start Using China's COVID-19 Vaccine After Strong Results - NDTV
articles.description: Turkey will receive its first shipment of China's Sinovac coronavirus vaccine within days as preliminary domestic tests showed it was 91% effective, Health Minister Fahrettin Koca said on Thursday.
articles.content:
Turkey Covid: The nation of 83 million has officially recorded 19,115 Covid deaths (Representational)
